name: MZ Heat Gun Kit
short_description: The Shrinkfast MZ is one of the most powerful heat shrink guns on the market. Our heat gun features an innovative ignition system that does not require a spark plug and also has a less intimidating flame spread but still provides even heat.

The Shrinkfast patented combustion cycle allows the flame to burn outside the combustor and keeps the heat tool cool to the touch during normal operation. Each MZ is individually tested for peak performance and safety before shipping.

The Shrinkfast MZ heat gun provides strong power fast heating in just seconds. Widely used for the number of applications such as shrink wrap, Vinyl Wrap, paint stripping, tube bending, crafts, phone, car wrapping, etc.

The Shrinkfast MZ heat gun is well-balanced and easy to grip. The dead-man trigger automatically shuts off the flow of propane and extinguishes the flame when released. The UL, CUL, CE approved regulator stops the flow of propane in case of leakage.

Shrinkfast MZ Heat Gun Kit Includes - Shrinkfast MZ heat shrink gun, 25’ Safety Certified Hose Assembly, UL Approved Regulator Assembly, UL Guard Assembly, MZ User’s Manual, Wrench, and Plastic Carrying Case.
product_description: Introducing the UL certified Shrinkfast Model MZ, your go-to solution for seamlessly wrapping pallets and unconventional items with shrink film for shipping and storage. Designed for both business and residential use, this handheld heat tool safeguards your assets, from patio furniture to vehicles and boats. The Shrinkfast MZ Heat Tool, fueled by propane, is purpose-built for applying heat to shrink wrap. Lightweight yet durable, it's hailed as one of the industry's leading DIY heat tools. Boasting 50,000 BTUs of power, the MZ ensures swift and efficient heat shrinking for smaller applications, all while delivering an even heat that eliminates unsightly holes common with industrial-grade tools. Incredibly user-friendly, this tool can shrink wrap a standard 40" x 48" x 60" pallet in under 4 minutes! With UL and CUL approvals, weighing only 1.75 lbs, and proudly made in the USA, the complete kit includes the Model MZ UL Approved Heat Tool, a 25' Safety Certified Hose Assembly, Regulator Assembly, Guard Assembly, User's Manual, Wrench, and a convenient Plastic Carrying Case.

name: 998 Heat Gun, 200000 BTU Propane Heat Gun, Ready to Use with 25' Hose, Regulator, Hard Case, and Wrench Made in the USA
short_description: Shrinkfast 998 Heat Gun has up to 260,00 BTUs of power, which can easily heat and shrink materials such as polyolefin (PO), polyethylene (PE), shrink wrap, polyvinyl chloride (PVC), and more. The 998 can allow you to bend and weld plastics as well.

Sleek design which can be handled easily. It weighs only 2.2 lbs and is considered very light compared to competitive heat guns. It was designed for excellent balance, operator comfort, and quick and simple usage.

The Shrinkfast 998 Heat Gun Kit includes the heat tool, 25' propane hose, adjustable regulator, wrench for tightening fittings, high-impact-plastic carrying case and an owners’ manual. The manufacturer’s recommended regulated pressure is 22.5 PSI. We also provide a full 1-year manufacturer’s warranty on parts.

The heat gun is very lightweight, durable, and suitable for a variety of jobs. This heat gun is perfect for crafters, DIYer, or handymen. It's also durable and powerful enough to be used on professional jobs.

The Shrinkfast heat gun has a wide range of applications, there are so many uses for a heat gun from domestic and crafty, to car maintenance and home improvement. Heat gun is ideal for shrink wrapping, removing old wallpaper, paint strippping, plastic & tarpaulin welding, and other similar jobs.
product_description: Shrinkfast 998 propane powered heat tool. 245,000 BTU's. Kit comes with 25' propane hose, adjustable regulator, wrench for tightening fittings, written instructions and metal carrying case. Optional extensions are sold separately. 1 Year Warranty

name: VEVOR Propane Heat Gun, Up to 187660 BTU Hot Air Gun with Adjustable Regulator, 26 FT Hose, and Hard Carrying Case, Ideal for Boat Plastic Film Shrink Wrapping, Pallet Packaging, Crafting
short_description: Efficient Heating Performance: This propane heat gun delivers a powerful 187,660 BTU output, heating 1 cubic meter pallet wrap in just about 1.5 minutes. Ideal for large-area shrink wrapping, the propane heat tool boosts efficiency.
Flexible Adjustment: Equipped with an adjustable regulator, users can easily use this shrink wrap heat tool to control flame intensity for optimal heating across various materials and environments.

Safe and Durable: The high-quality stainless steel hood at the nozzle of the heat gun tool provides high temperature insulation, ensuring safe operation in busy work settings and on-site applications from getting burnt.

Easy Operation: Simple button controls on the heat gun for shrinking wrapping make operation easy, even for beginners. The ergonomic handle fits comfortably in the hand, reducing fatigue during extended use.

Wide Application: Lightweight and portable, with a carrying case included, this heat gun tool is ideal for on-the-go tasks. The heat gun kit effortlessly handles applications like boat shrink wrapping, pallet packaging, and other heat-shrink tasks, offering flexible and efficient performance.

name: Master Appliance HT-1000 Cordless Butane Heat Gun with Shrink Reflector - Refillable, Portable Hot Air Tool for Heat Shrink Tubing, Electrical and Automotive Repairs
short_description: USA FAMILY-OWNED COMPANY: Brought to you by Master Appliance, a 4 Generation USA Family Owned Company. The HT-1000 cordless heat gun is portable and lightweight, weighing only 20.6 oz. Without cables and wires restricting your movement, you can use the hot air gun just about anywhere your project is. This cordless heat gun can help you take on many jobs including thawing frozen pipes, terminate shrink tubing and wire connectors. This heat gun is powered by butane fuel

BUTANE POWERED: For the best performance, use Master's Ultratane butane refill. One full tank of butane will last up to 40 minutes of use. This butane-powered heat gun has a self-igniting piezo electric ignition. It only takes seconds to refill the hot air gun and the runtime is longer than a battery powered heat gun. Cordless heat at its best.

MULTIPURPOSE HEAT GUN: A versatile hot air gun, use on heat shrink tubing, wire connectors to soldering and de-soldering. The Master Appliance portable heat gun has a temperature range of 650F to 950F (343C to 510C) for quick and effective heating ability. Use the hot air gun to loosen rusted bolts, defrost frozen metal, terminate electrical wire connectors and terminals, and more.

HIGH PERFORMANCE: Master Appliance portable hot gun has multiple flames providing impressive heat and airflow. The butane flames stay contained within the nozzle giving you flameless effective heat. The hot gun's nozzle rotates 90 degrees and adjusts into five (5) separate position settings

CORDLESS HEAT GUN SPECIFICATIONS: Temp at nozzle: 650F to 950F (343C to 510C). Tool weight: 20.6 oz. Power: 366 watts max. The hot air gun will run on a full tank for approximately 40 minutes at a high setting. This portable heat gun includes one (1) shrink tube reflector. Dimensions: 7.1"L x 7.6"H x 1.2"W. Shipped without butane.

name: 355pcs Heat Shrink Tubing Kit with 1000W Heat Gun - 3:1 Shrink- Electrical Waterproof Industrial Heat Shrink Tubing Terminals- Marine Grade Wire Connector Shrink Wrap Tube - 3.15" Length
short_description: 【Package Content of Shrink Tubing Kit】1pcs 1000W heat gun for shrink tubing and 355pcs (9 sizes) heat shrink tubing kit, wire shrink wrap tubing of black color, 9 different most commonly used sizes meet your different needs, this wiring heatshrink terminals kit are ideal for connecting various wires and cables. 3/32"(80pcs), 1/8"(120pcs), 3/16"(60pcs), 1/4"(40pcs), 5/16"(15pcs), 3/8"(10pcs), 1/2"(10pcs), 5/8"(10pcs), 3/4"(10pcs).

【1000W Hot Air Gun】Twippo heat shrink gun has two temperature settings: level I : 338°F/170°C, level II : 752°F/400°C. Double heat coil & 1000W high power quickly let the shrink wrap heat gun increase high heat in a few seconds, built in over-heat protection can cut off automatically when overheated, ensure maximum security to users. We recommend that you use the high temperature setting to heat the shrink wrap tubing. Twippo heat gun for wire connectors are manufactured to North American safety standards and pass UL safety certified & FCC.

【3:1 Shrink Ratio and Adhesive Lined】Twippo waterproof heat shrink tubing for hoses has a unique double wall design, 3:1 shrink ratio of these heat shrink wire tubing terminals has a thermal activated sealant lining, providing a 360-degree safety seal, eliminates the problem of 2:1 tubing not shrinking tight enough. When the heat shrink wire connectors are heated by heat gun, the adhesive melts and the heat shrink tube is sealed all the way to the end of the heat shrink tape, so these heat shrink tubing have good waterproof performance.

【3.15" Length of Heat Shrink Kit】Twippo wire heat shrink tubing are made of high quality polyolefin to ensure high chemical stability, good electrical insulation, good sealing, and safe. We offer a length of 80mm(3.15"), longer than others, to achieve more possibilities for work. Get to know our shrink tubing for wires, perfect heat shrink tube kit.

【Widely Applications of Shrink Wrap】Marine heat shrink tubing can be used in marine and automotive wiring, are great for hoses, car, motorcycle, truck, boat, solar panels, mower and audio stereo etc., our large size heat shrink tubing also applicable to industrial cables, these marine grade heat shrink tubing can provides greater pull strength, believe that our heat shrink electrical connectors kit can give you a great help, DIY automotive tools and other more.

【Service of Heat Shrink Tube】If you have any dissatisfaction with the heat shrink wrap or the size of shrink tube for wires, we can offer you 365 days payment refund guarantee, and give you a refund for electrical shrink tubing. Sincerely wish you a happy shopping!
